8.eng-name: Prayer (Kitab Al-Salat): Detailed Injunctions about Witr

hadiths.text: Masruq said:I asked 'Aishah: When would the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) observe the witr prayer ? She replied: Any time he observed the witr, sometimes in the early hours of the night, sometimes at midnight and sometimes towards the end of it. But he used to observe the witr just before the dawn when he died

chapter.eng-name: The Time Of The Witr Prayer
